[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/WHR-HP-G300N On the DD-WRT wiki]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=68073 On the DD-WRT forums] (AR9283-AL1A part mention, high res board shot)
[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=23243 On the OpenWrt forums], [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=35721 and again] :This device is apparently now supported in '''Attitude Adjustment'''. [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Supported_Devices#Buffalo On the DD-WRT Supported Devices table] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buffalo_AirStation Listed on the 'Buffalo AirStation' page on Wikipedia] (note: listed as having 8MB RAM) The device appears to be a Cameo product. The default SSID appears to be the MAC address (no delimiters, upper case hex letters).
